availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Ira Munger Major, Jr. (Frankfort lawyer)

body.p: College educated Frankfort based publisher. Worked as an editor for the Kentucky Yeoman beginning around 1850, and studied law. Married Mary Brown Scott on October 30, 1862.

bibl.p: 1850 Census; 1860 Census; 1870 Census; Find A Grave, "Samuel Ira Munger Major Jr. (1830 - 1886) https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=major&GSfn=samuel&GSmn=ira&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=69442533&df=all&, (Accessed January 29, 2017)
